DOC.brief_summary: This study´s aim is to explore physiological associations concerning pulse wave velocity, heart rate and blood pressure in order to make taking the blood pressure more comfortable.
DOC.brief_title: Haemodynamic Feasibility Study of Sensors Within a Tilting Table Examination
DOC.criteria: patients with syncope and planned tilting table investigation male and female patients aged at least 18 years persons being able to understand and to follow the study stuff´s instructions pregnancy or breast feeding patients not being able to consent cardiac pacemaker / defibrillator illness of skin
